AboutPage.founderText: After 8+ years of teaching in the UAE, Tracey built NoorLingo to help children read with true understanding—not just recognize words. Every lesson is shaped by her classroom experience, cultural insight, and passion for helping kids succeed.
AboutPage.founderQuote: “I created NoorLingo to teach how I always wanted to teach— meaningfully, culturally, and with joy.”

MissionValues.whyWeExistText: Many Arabic-speaking students in the UAE struggle with English—not because of lack of ability, but because tools often miss how they learn best. NoorLingo bridges that gap.
MissionValues.coreValuesText: The values that guide our mission to help every child read with confidence, think critically, and stay connected to their culture. These beliefs guide everything we create—helping children not only read, but understand, express, and thrive.
MissionValues.value1Text: Deep understanding—not just word recognition.We focus on helping children truly understand what they read—connecting ideas & grasping meaning.
MissionValues.value2Text: Our stories and characters reflect the UAE’s unique culture, language, and heritage—helping children feel represented & respected.
MissionValues.value3Text: We use proven strategies like predicting, visualizing, and summarizing to turn reading into an active, engaging process focus, and creative thinking in every lesson.
MissionValues.value4Text: We believe every child—regardless of background or learning level—should have access to stories that teach, inspire, and reflect who they are.

AboutUsHome.title: Get to Know About Us
AboutUsHome.text: NoorLingo is a UAE-based English reading app tailored for Arabic-speaking children. Through engaging storytelling, STEM vocabulary, and culturally rich content, we help young learners read with true comprehension—not just word recognition. Our stories reflect UAE heritage and values, using research-backed methods to foster confidence, focus, and a love for learning. Driven by a mission of cultural pride and educational equity, NoorLingo empowers children across the UAE to become lifelong readers and critical thinkers

FounderMessage.title: A Message from Our Founder
FounderMessage.p1: After teaching English in UAE classrooms for over 8 years, I saw a repeating challenge—bright, capable students struggling to understand English, not because they lacked potential, but because most learning tools weren’t made for them. I founded NoorLingo to change that.
FounderMessage.p2: Most apps are built for global audiences and teach children how to sound out words—but not how to understand them. Our students needed more than recognition—they needed comprehension, connection, and context. NoorLingo was born to meet that need. We use culturally relevant stories, academic vocabulary, and reading strategies like predicting, visualizing, and summarizing—backed by research and designed for how children really learn.
FounderMessage.p3: At NoorLingo, we’re not just helping kids read. We’re helping them think critically, grow in confidence, and feel proud of who they are.

ParentGuide.title: NoorLingo Parent Guide
ParentGuide.section1Text: NoorLingo is a culturally rooted English reading app designed for Arabic-speaking children aged 5-13. Our mission is to help children become confident readers, critical thinkers, and proud of their heritage while building English fluency.
ParentGuide.section2Text1: NoorLingo uses the CAFE reading strategies to build strong literacy foundations:
ParentGuide.cafeC: - Comprehension: Understanding the main idea and supporting details.
ParentGuide.cafeA: - Accuracy: Reading words correctly with attention to spelling and meaning.
ParentGuide.cafeF: - Fluency: Reading smoothly with appropriate expression and pacing.
ParentGuide.cafeE: - Expanding Vocabulary: Learning new words in meaningful context.
ParentGuide.section2Text2: For example, when predicting, readers use text clues and background knowledge to make logical guesses about the story.
ParentGuide.section2Text3: All lessons integrate English with science, math, and moral education. Gamified elements like badges and progress bars make reading enjoyable while reinforcing key academic skills.
ParentGuide.step1: Download NoorLingo from the App Store or Google Play (coming soon).
ParentGuide.step3: Add your child's name, age, and grade to build their profile.
ParentGuide.step4: Set time limits and reading goals in your Parent Dashboard.
ParentGuide.diff1: Stories reflect UAE heritage and traditions.
ParentGuide.diff2: Lessons build comprehension, not just word reading.
ParentGuide.diff3: Designed for second-language learners with full narration and visual supports.
ParentGuide.diff4: Created by UAE-based English teachers and curriculum experts.
ParentGuide.safe1: No ads, no in-app purchases, and no data shared with third parties.
ParentGuide.safe2: All content is reviewed by UAE-based teachers and curriculum experts for curriculum alignment.
ParentGuide.safe3: Profiles are secure and parent-controlled only.
ParentGuide.section6Title: 6. How Can I Track My Child's Progress?
ParentGuide.progress1: Use your Parent Dashboard to see stories read, time spent reading, and quiz scores.
ParentGuide.progress2: Look for growth signs like better vocabulary, improved comprehension, and reading confidence.
